info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.
info.title: Twilio - Sync

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

AclEnabled.description: Whether token identities in the Service must be granted access to Sync objects by using the [Permissions](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/sync-permissions) resource.

FriendlyName.description: A string that you assign to describe the resource.

ReachabilityDebouncingEnabled.description: Whether every `endpoint_disconnected` event should occur after a configurable delay. The default is `false`, where the `endpoint_disconnected` event occurs immediately after disconnection. When `true`, intervening reconnections can prevent the `endpoint_disconnected` event.

ReachabilityDebouncingWindow.description: The reachability event delay in milliseconds if `reachability_debouncing_enabled` = `true`.  Must be between 1,000 and 30,000 and defaults to 5,000. This is the number of milliseconds after the last running client disconnects, and a Sync identity is declared offline, before the `webhook_url` is called if all endpoints remain offline. A reconnection from the same identity by any endpoint during this interval prevents the call to `webhook_url`.

ReachabilityWebhooksEnabled.description: Whether the service instance should call `webhook_url` when client endpoints connect to Sync. The default is `false`.

WebhookUrl.description: The URL we should call when Sync objects are manipulated.

WebhooksFromRestEnabled.description: Whether the Service instance should call `webhook_url` when the REST API is used to update Sync objects. The default is `false`.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Document resources to read.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The default list of Sync Documents will show both active and expired items. It is possible to filter only the active ones by hiding the expired ones.
parameters.name: HideExpired

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) to create the new Document resource in.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

Data.description: A JSON string that represents an arbitrary, schema-less object that the Sync Document stores. Can be up to 16KB in length.

Ttl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Sync Document expires and is deleted (the Sync Document's time-to-live). Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Sync Document does not expire. The Sync Document will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

UniqueName.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the Sync Document

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Permissions applying to a Sync Document.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Document Permission resources to read.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync Document with the Document Permission resources to read. Can be the Document resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

delete.description: Delete a specific Sync Document Permission.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Document Permission resource to delete.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync Document with the Document Permission resource to delete. Can be the Document resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

parameters.description: The application-defined string that uniquely identifies the User's Document Permission resource to delete.
parameters.name: Identity

get.description: Fetch a specific Sync Document Permission.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Document Permission resource to fetch.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.name: Identity

post.description: Update an identity's access to a specific Sync Document.

parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync Document with the Document Permission resource to update. Can be the Document resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.
parameters.name: DocumentSid

parameters.description: The application-defined string that uniquely identifies the User's Document Permission resource to update.
parameters.name: Identity

Manage.description: Whether the identity can delete the Sync Document. Default value is `false`.

Read.description: Whether the identity can read the Sync Document. Default value is `false`.

Write.description: Whether the identity can update the Sync Document. Default value is `false`.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Document resource to delete.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Document resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The If-Match HTTP request header
parameters.name: If-Match

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Document resource to fetch.

parameters.description: The SID of the Document resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Document resource to update.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Document resource to update.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The If-Match HTTP request header
parameters.name: If-Match

Data.description: A JSON string that represents an arbitrary, schema-less object that the Sync Document stores. Can be up to 16KB in length.

Ttl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Sync Document expires and is deleted (time-to-live). Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Document resource does not expire. The Document resource will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync List resources to read.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The default list of Sync Lists will show both active and expired items. It is possible to filter only the active ones by hiding the expired ones.
parameters.name: HideExpired

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) to create the new Sync List in.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

CollectionTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Sync List expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.  Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Sync List does not expire. The Sync List will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Ttl.description: Alias for collection_ttl. If both are provided, this value is ignored.

UniqueName.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource. This value must be unique within its Service and it can be up to 320 characters long. The `unique_name` value can be used as an alternative to the `sid` in the URL path to address the resource.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the List Item resources to read.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync List with the List Items to read. Can be the Sync List resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.
parameters.name: ListSid

parameters.description: How to order the List Items returned by their `index` value. Can be: `asc` (ascending) or `desc` (descending) and the default is ascending.
parameters.name: Order

parameters.description: The `index` of the first Sync List Item resource to read. See also `bounds`.
parameters.name: From

parameters.description: Whether to include the List Item referenced by the `from` parameter. Can be: `inclusive` to include the List Item referenced by the `from` parameter or `exclusive` to start with the next List Item. The default value is `inclusive`.
parameters.name: Bounds

parameters.description: The default list of Sync List items will show both active and expired items. It is possible to filter only the active ones by hiding the expired ones.
parameters.name: HideExpired

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) to create the new List Item in.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync List to add the new List Item to. Can be the Sync List resource's `sid` or its `unique_name`.
parameters.name: ListSid

CollectionTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the List Item's parent Sync List expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.  Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the parent Sync List does not expire. The Sync List will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Data.description: A JSON string that represents an arbitrary, schema-less object that the List Item stores. Can be up to 16KB in length.

ItemTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the List Item expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.  Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the List Item does not expire. The List Item will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Ttl.description: An alias for `item_ttl`. If both parameters are provided, this value is ignored.

The default value is `0`, which means the parent Sync List does not expire. The Sync List will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Data.description: A JSON string that represents an arbitrary, schema-less object that the List Item stores. Can be up to 16KB in length.

The default value is `0`, which means the List Item does not expire. The List Item will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Manage.description: Whether the identity can delete the Sync List. Default value is `false`.

Read.description: Whether the identity can read the Sync List and its Items. Default value is `false`.

Write.description: Whether the identity can create, update, and delete Items in the Sync List. Default value is `false`.

CollectionTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Sync List expires (time-to-live) and is deleted. Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Sync List does not expire. The Sync List will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync Map resources to read.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The default list of Sync Maps will show both active and expired items. It is possible to filter only the active ones by hiding the expired ones.
parameters.name: HideExpired

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) to create the Sync Map in.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

CollectionTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Sync Map expires (time-to-live) and is deleted. Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Sync Map does not expire. The Sync Map will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Ttl.description: An alias for `collection_ttl`. If both parameters are provided, this value is ignored.

UniqueName.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource. It can be used as an alternative to the `sid` in the URL path to address the resource.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Map Item resources to read.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync Map with the Sync Map Item resource to fetch. Can be the Sync Map's `sid` or its `unique_name`.
parameters.name: MapSid

parameters.description: How to order the Map Items returned by their `key` value. Can be: `asc` (ascending) or `desc` (descending) and the default is ascending. Map Items are [ordered lexicographically](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lexicographical_order) by Item key.
parameters.name: Order

parameters.description: The `key` of the first Sync Map Item resource to read. See also `bounds`.
parameters.name: From

parameters.description: Whether to include the Map Item referenced by the `from` parameter. Can be: `inclusive` to include the Map Item referenced by the `from` parameter or `exclusive` to start with the next Map Item. The default value is `inclusive`.
parameters.name: Bounds

parameters.description: The default list of Sync Map items will show both active and expired items. It is possible to filter only the active ones by hiding the expired ones.
parameters.name: HideExpired

parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.
parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) to create the Map Item in.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync Map to add the new Map Item to.
parameters.name: MapSid

CollectionTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Map Item's parent Sync Map expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.  Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the parent Sync Map does not expire. The Sync Map will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Data.description: A JSON string that represents an arbitrary, schema-less object that the Map Item stores. Can be up to 16KB in length.

ItemTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Map Item expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.  Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Map Item does not expire.  The Map Item will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Key.description: The unique, user-defined key for the Map Item. Can be up to 320 characters long.

Ttl.description: An alias for `item_ttl`. If both parameters are provided, this value is ignored.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync Map Item resource to delete.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync Map with the Sync Map Item resource to delete. Can be the Sync Map's `sid` or its `unique_name`.
parameters.name: MapSid

parameters.description: The `key` value of the Sync Map Item resource to delete.
parameters.name: Key

parameters.name: MapSid

parameters.name: MapSid

parameters.description: The `key` value of the Sync Map Item resource to update.
parameters.name: Key

parameters.description: The If-Match HTTP request header
parameters.name: If-Match

CollectionTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Map Item's parent Sync Map expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.  Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the parent Sync Map does not expire. This parameter can only be used when the Map Item's `data` or `ttl` is updated in the same request. The Sync Map will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Data.description: A JSON string that represents an arbitrary, schema-less object that the Map Item stores. Can be up to 16KB in length.

ItemTtl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Map Item expires (time-to-live) and is deleted.  Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Map Item does not expire. The Map Item will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

Ttl.description: An alias for `item_ttl`. If both parameters are provided, this value is ignored.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all Streams in a Service Instance.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Stream resources to read.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The default list of Sync Streams will show both active and expired items. It is possible to filter only the active ones by hiding the expired ones.
parameters.name: HideExpired

parameters.name: PageSize

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) to create the new Stream in.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

Ttl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Stream expires and is deleted (time-to-live). Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Stream does not expire. The Stream will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

UniqueName.description: An application-defined string that uniquely identifies the resource. This value must be unique within its Service and it can be up to 320 characters long. The `unique_name` value can be used as an alternative to the `sid` in the URL path to address the resource.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) with the Sync Stream resource to delete.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Stream resource to delete.

parameters.name: Sid

parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Stream resource to update.
parameters.name: Sid

Ttl.description: How long, in seconds, before the Stream expires and is deleted (time-to-live). Can be an integer from 0 to 31,536,000 (1 year). The default value is `0`, which means the Stream does not expire. The Stream will be deleted automatically after it expires, but there can be a delay between the expiration time and the resources's deletion.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Sync Service](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/service) to create the new Stream Message in.
parameters.name: ServiceSid

parameters.description: The SID of the Sync Stream to create the new Stream Message resource for.
parameters.name: StreamSid

Data.description: A JSON string that represents an arbitrary, schema-less object that makes up the Stream Message body. Can be up to 4KB in length.

parameters.description: The SID of the Service resource to delete.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service resource to fetch.
parameters.name: Sid

parameters.description: The SID of the Service resource to update.
parameters.name: Sid

AclEnabled.description: Whether token identities in the Service must be granted access to Sync objects by using the [Permissions](https://www.twilio.com/docs/sync/api/sync-permissions) resource.

FriendlyName.description: A string that you assign to describe the resource.

ReachabilityDebouncingEnabled.description: Whether every `endpoint_disconnected` event should occur after a configurable delay. The default is `false`, where the `endpoint_disconnected` event occurs immediately after disconnection. When `true`, intervening reconnections can prevent the `endpoint_disconnected` event.

ReachabilityDebouncingWindow.description: The reachability event delay in milliseconds if `reachability_debouncing_enabled` = `true`.  Must be between 1,000 and 30,000 and defaults to 5,000. This is the number of milliseconds after the last running client disconnects, and a Sync identity is declared offline, before the webhook is called if all endpoints remain offline. A reconnection from the same identity by any endpoint during this interval prevents the webhook from being called.

ReachabilityWebhooksEnabled.description: Whether the service instance should call `webhook_url` when client endpoints connect to Sync. The default is `false`.

WebhookUrl.description: The URL we should call when Sync objects are manipulated.

WebhooksFromRestEnabled.description: Whether the Service instance should call `webhook_url` when the REST API is used to update Sync objects. The default is `false`.

tags.description: PLEASE NOTE that this is a Beta product that is subject to change. Use it with caution.
tags.name: Beta
